name: Weapons Display (V)
Lore: 'The X-wing''s display panel allows for different firing patterns for different weapons. This gives the pilot the ability to switch weapon types with minimum time and energy loss.',
Text: 'Plays on table. Whenever opponent excludes any character(s) from battle, they lose 2 Force. At end of opponent''s turn, if you control two battlegrounds (a site and a system) and opponent deployed a card with ability and did not inititate a battle, may retrieve 1 Force.',
